page.title: 17The Care of Pets
page.content:
"The Pet and Garden Shop" is a good place for finding all sorts of food for all kinds of pets.The most common food which is sold there is dog biscuits.In fact about 100lbs. (45kg.) are sold in one day. Cages for budgies are also sold along with fish-tanks and almost everything else that any pet would need to live a happy life.
Dogs are the most common animal that the vet sees.Of these the labrador is the most common.The vet also works on many birds like budgies.The oldest bird he has worked on was 57 years old and it was a parrot. Generally the vet sees 20 animals in a day.He mostly works on young pets rather than old.He is sometimes called out through the night.Diarrhoea is the most common illness in all pets.
